CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.4.k.5.6, drugcumulativedosagenumb (10N)
E2B (R3): G.k.5a Cumulative Dose to First Reaction (number) Conformance: Optional, but required if G.k.5b is populated. Data Type: 10N OID: None Value Allowed: Numeric
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The cumulative dose provided is the total dose administered until the first sign, symptom, or reaction.
CustomField.label: Cumulative Dose to First Reaction (Num)
